nodes.text: Reelo Baruk's hideout on Nar Shaddaa was located inside one of his waste management facilities.

In 12 ABY, Kyle Katarn discovered this hideout when he was seeking for Reelo Baruk. The two eventually met. After a short conversation with Katarn, Reelo activated the the autoturrets on the ceiling of the main chamber. While Katarn was fighting the autoturrets and incoming guards, Reelo escaped the hideout using a secret tunnel.
